title: Pose
description: The pose of the vessel given as a combination of a GeoJSON Point (lon, lat, z) and Euler angles according to the Yaw-Pitch-Roll convention.

position.description: Position of vessel reference point, according to: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7946#section-4

roll.title: Roll angle
roll.description: Roll angle of vessel [radians], positive to starboard

pitch.title: Pitch angle
pitch.description: Pitch angle of vessel [radians], positive bow up

yaw.title: Yaw angle
yaw.description: Yaw angle of vessel (i.e. heading)[radians], positive bow to starboard
